I've spent many many hours playing this game and watching it on Twitch, and it's been a great time. Surviving with friends is especially fun. It's not perfectly balanced but I do think the devs are listening and it really has improved over time. Overall, lots of fun.

Jugabilidad 4 vs 1 muy entretenida. Mientras que el asesino debe cazar a los supervivientes estos deben reparar todos los generadores para escapar del recinto. Es un título que hace de las películas clásicas de terror de "grupo de chavales huyen de asesino" un juego con sus propias reglas. La premisa no es terror como tal sino ganar siguiendo reglas muy estrictas, es como jugar al escondite.
 
En la piel del asesino se juega en primera persona y, sabiendo de antemano la localización de los generadores, tendrás que buscar y elimar a todos los supervivientes aguzando vista y oído y aprovechandote de los fallos que estos cometan (por ejemplo si el superviviente corre en lugar de andar o simplemente va herido dejará un rastro). Pero no podrás hacerlo de cualquier forma, deberás golpear para incapacitar a los supervivientes y después llevarlos hasta un gancho y colgarlos hasta la muerte, podrás resistirse un tiempo y ser salvados por un compañero pero si el tiempo pasa acabarán muriendo. Como superviviente verás en tercera persona y deberás moverte con cautela resolviendo los puzzles de los generadores sin cometer errores o alertarás al asesino, antes de que esté lo bastante cerca una música terrorífica te alertará para que te escondas rápidamente o te vayas antes de que te encuentre. Son acciones no muy exigentes mentalmente pero que se vuelven muy complicadas si le sumas la tensión de alguien buscándote para matarte.

Sin embargo más allá de la jugabilidad, que es buena y original, el sistema de progresión basado en desbloquear perks y consumibles me parece muy mal diseñado, cada nivel da la sensación de que te dan cosas aleatorias para desbloquear en vez de hacer que progreses.

¿Que sentido tiene que si quiero usar una linterna necesite un personaje que en uno de sus niveles casualmente desbloquea una? entonces la uso en una partida y la pierdo hasta que encuentre otra. El tema de los perks que dan pasivas al personaje está bien, pero no entiendo que sentido tiene un consumible cuyo efecto es "si juegas en tal escenario pasa esto" pero lo usas y si toca otro escenario te jodes y lo pierdes.

En términos generales la experiencia es buena pero muy repetitiva.

Opino que una tienda de objetos funcionaría mucho mejor, gastas los puntos en comprar el comsumible que quieres y así personalizas tu estilo de juego, y en lugar de rellenar los nivelñes con consumibles y cosas sin sentido centrarlo únicamente en habilidad pasivas que diferencien a cada personaje.

Pero lo peor de todo es la nefasta política de dlcs, si todo ese contenido se desbloquease jugando ya habría una buena razón para hacerlo pasadas las 10 o 15 horas que es lo máximo que puede entretener lo que ofrece de base. La vida útil del juego depende de cuanto estes dispuesto a vaciar tu cartera.
Meta perk change spiel ist jetzt kompletter dreck alla guck dir Hart im nehmen an wie gay is das denn bitte PFUIH!!!
good game

Hammermäßiges Horror Game! Macht absolut Laune und kann man auch nach vielen, vielen Stunden noch mit viel Spaß geniesen. In Gruppen mit Freunden macht es auf jeden Fall auch noch mehr Laune. Anfangs ist es ein echter Heartbeat-"Generator" und dürfte sich gegen erfahrene Spieler als schwierig erweisen, doch mit etwas Übung kommt man sofort rein. Absolute Kaufempfehlung :)

And another DLC just released, summing up the total price of the DLCs only to 62,89€. The base game is 19,99€. EA is that you hiding behind Behaviour Digital Inc.?

Most of the DLCs add new killers and/or survivors. Each with a unique set of 3 perks which are very hard to obtain if you don't own the DLC. You can, however, obtain them through an ingame "shrine" which holds 4 random killer and surivivor perks which resets every week. The catch is however that the shrine may also contain perks that you already own or if you play one side only, like killer or survivor, it may contain 4 perks of the other side, making it almost impossible to get the perks from DLCs that you need/want.

And that's just the DLC point of view.
The game itself is buggy as hell, map design is a mess and the community is cancerous as hell. Pay 2 win is written in big letters in this game, luckily I'm not poor :kek:

1対4の非対称隠れ鬼ごっこゲームです。ユニークなキャラクターがいて自分に合うものがわかれば快適にプレイできます。
しかしながら日本語の翻訳があまりにも直訳すぎるので意味を理解するのは大変です。あとこれは仕様なのかもしれませんがパークや行動に制限があったり発動されないことが多々あります。その点をのぞけば満点のゲームだと思います。
初心者の方はキラーからゲームに慣れてキラーの動きが把握できてからサバイバーに移ったほうがいいと思います。
キラーの立ち回りは大体決まりますがサバイバーの場合ではキラー対策にいろいろな行動が要求されます。そのためサバイバーはキラーに比べ慣れるのが難しいと思います。
低下以上の価値は絶対あるのでダウンロードしてみては？
１３日の金曜日という似たゲームもありますがそちらは双方向攻撃ができてしまうのでイライラするかもしれません。
長文でしたが参考になるとありがたいです。

(ง •̀_•́)ง 嘛，记得刚买完游戏没多久，每天打完游戏都有一些屠夫或者人类会主动来加好友一起玩，加好友的原因也很简单，比如：菜啊！！好欺负啊！！！怎么这么蠢啊！！！！作为一个孤独患者，还是每天迷迷糊糊的玩着屠夫。（其实就是不喜欢被说，虽然本来就是很菜~

直到后来认识了冷血，老鬼和QE，还记得刚开始认识他们的第一天的那时候连QTE都不会按，竟然教了我一晚上，突然对这个游戏充满了好奇心，想着自己以后会不会能和他们一样熟练的修机，溜屠夫，渐渐的也就喜欢上了玩人。(｡･ω･)ﾉ

现在依旧是那么菜，虽然不至于拖后腿需要别人各种救（虽然也没差（/TДT)/  ，碰到段位低的还是能欺负一下就超开心（喂，被大佬欺负了还不是一样怨念的很(╬▔皿▔) ,

说了半天，谈谈感受ヽ(•̀ω•́ )ゝ ：
1.玩久了不像刚开始那么热情不会天天去玩（不代表所有人，毕竟有专一的大佬 \(•ㅂ•)/♥），但是隔三差五对这个游戏始终是玩起来就停不下来（一玩玩到大半夜，对时间毫无感觉），
2.良心的制作组也是不会A游戏的动力之一（一直坚持更新，很照顾中国玩家的说），
3.很推荐和朋友一起入，一起感受偷电的乐趣 (´・ω・`) 
4.就算是一个人也是很推荐入的，毕竟偷电不成可以玩屠夫以四趴为目标来虐人嘛(≖ ‿ ≖)✧  
5.不悔入杀鸡 (╭￣3￣)╭♡

《黎明杀机》制作组成员大部分是八十年代美国恐怖电影爱好者，兴趣把他们聚在了一起开发了这款游戏，这里面的每位杀手都有自己的故事，其中一些会拥有自己独特的背景音乐和歌声。
  逃生者开满五台电机能使两扇逃生大门通电，接着再花些时间打开逃生大门即可成功逃生，在此之前只能通过翻窗，用板子把屠夫砸晕以及用手电照瞎屠夫暂时逃脱。大部分杀手拥有心跳，杀手越近心跳越快，属于杀手的背景音乐也会越大，小部分杀手没有心跳，可以像幽灵一样接近人类。
  在神秘的高段位，有一些勇敢的逃生者，会在追逐过程中极力嘲讽屠夫，那么接下来他可能会一直被杀手追杀，永远活在压迫感之下直到被杀或者逃出去，为了磨练技术或者为了一时的快感，不管因为什么，始终没有得手会让屠夫更加愤怒，能够翻下的板子也会变得更少，勇敢的逃生者感到了恐惧，幸好听见逃生大门通电的声音，求生的希望又重新燃起，不过与此同时燃起的还有隐藏在地图某个角落的厄咒图腾，屠夫的杀戮欲望达到了极致，最后的临别礼物，送给正在打开大门的可怜人。

Думаю лучшее решение избавить игру от такого комьюнити - повысить стоимость за игру! Серьезно, стоимость игры сейчас по моим меркам очень низкая, ее может позволить себе любой школьник. Повышайте ценник как например стоимость игры для консоли. 

Сейчас очень много кемперов и тунеллеров, признаться я и сама могу затунеллить игрока, если он в наглую светит мне в лицо и пытается довести (чтобы я бегала только за ним, пока другие заводят). Но сурвам сейчас очень тяжело - особенно, когда им встречается бубба-кемпер с инсидиусом. 

Вы пытаетесь усложнить поиск игр для пати, но при этом в игру невозможно играть НЕ в пати.

Игру рекомендую, НО изменения нужны.

Frustrating at times but only because you're at the mercy of how others want to play. A killer who wants to ruin the game on the survivors can easily do so, but once you stop letting that get to you the game is a ton of fun.
Is a good and nice game!

-Desync Problems.
-A lot of bugs.
-Long queue times when playing with friends.
-A lot of trolls who are interested in messing around instead of working towards the game's goal.
-Any hack that bypasses the anti-cheat is allowed unless you take the time yourself to provide video proof. Developers keep no logs and are not interested in anyway, feel free to break the "rules" as in cheating, trolling or farming with the opponent.

-Has a lot of customizations and great looking cosmetics.
-A lot of survivors, killers, abilities and perks to choose from.

Na niższych rangach gra zmienia nazwę na Lobby, Camping lub Tunneling Symulator ale po dłuższym graniu powinna spodobać się każdemu. Oczywiście po tylu latach dalej natrafiamy na niezliczoną ilość bugów :)
Gra na prawde nie dopracowana, lecz zabawe jaką można z niej czerpać przekracza wszelkie granice, dlatego bardzo POLECAM tę gre!

An addicitve game for sure, but not without it's faults. Sadly, the commuity is far worse than any of the actual in game issues. The very nature of a 1v4 or 4v1 game, depending on which side you play, creates a rift between main's of both sides, each complaining ceaselessly about how the game is stacked against them. The forums are toxic, the pre and post game chat is typically toxic, and salt rains from the heavens no matter the match outcome. That aside, the game itself is actually enjoyable, and for as much as people complain, each profile you see will be demonstrating hundreds of hours spent in the fog. 

**PROS**
SURVIVORS:
-Escaping a match is satisfying, no matter what Rank you're on.
-Getting in with a decent team is a rare reward, and makes the experience much more enjoyable.
-Tense moments trying to rescue, gen work, or explore make the game worthwhile.
-Learning how to face each Killer is challenging, and fun to master. 

KILLERS:
-There's nothing more satisfying than throwing someone on a hook and watching them dangle helplessly. 
-Harsher and less forgiving learning curve that's satisfying to improve on.
-Ultra-Rare add-ons take survivors by surprise and make for quick, satisfying matches. 
-Unlike survivors, you have the ability to see your opponents in lobby and plan load-outs accordingly. 

**CONS**
SURVIVORS:
-90% of your teams will be horrible. Gen ignoring, Yolo saving, point farming, ragequitting, etc, etc, etc.
-You *need* to rely on the three other people on your team, and they tend to be your biggest handicap. (see #1)
-A survivor is just as much of a target for post-game salt if you play in a style that others don't agree with. (see #1)
-You will watch your Rank fall for situations completely out of your control. (again see #1, disconnecting kilers, etc)

KILLERS:
-Facing a 4-man SWF loadout, though much rarer than claimed, is completely stacked against you.
-Poor map design in terms of survivor assistance can have you running around for days after one person.
-Rework needs to be done to assist in Killer loadouts (better Hex totem design, etc)
-Rank Reset will have new Killers ready to uninstall the game after 20 mins. 

**THE GAME OVERALL**
PROS:
-Fun and addictive, with a learning curve that's obtainable but hardly forgiving.
-Prestige gives you targets to aim for.
-Some really good people in the game, and easy to make new friends in the right circumstances.
-Tense, close matches between Survivors and Killers make the entire experience worthwhile. 

CONS:
-You can get absolutely steamrolled on either side in certain matches.
-Bugs are constantly popping up, even when one is fixed, two more show up.
-No Region lock at all. This means you can spend 20 mins in lobbies trying to find a ping less than 200.
-Disconnects of any nature throw the game completely off, and something needs to be worked out. 
-The community at large is toxic as hell. 
-Imbalance of Perks leads to specific Meta builds on both sides of the game, creating a very generic experience. 
-Map design needs to be reworked in order to better balance the game. (Currently in progress)
-Certain Killers need to be reworked in order to make them viable. *cough* Freddy *cough*
-High Ranks (1,2,3) are basically the same maps, with the same killers, and same perk loadouts on repeat.

**FINAL THOUGHTS**
The premise and implementation of the game is great, and I understand that it's ridiculously hard to balance a game of this nature to where the majority of players are pleased. There's a reason why so many people have pumped hundreds, if not thousands, of hours into this game. The Devs are visible, they try to keep the community informed, and are always releasing new content, which is great, but I believe that more focus needs to be put into ensuring the core of the game is perfected first. If you're new, you're in for a rough ride, but it gets better, and much more enjoyable. There's alot of great aspects to the game, which makes it worth spending time in. You *will* get frustrated, you *will* have some absolutely horrible matches, but you "Join a Lobby" and take another stab at it. Overall, the good outweighs the bad in my opinion, and I trust the developers to keep chipping away at the monumental task that is balancing the game.

Tavsiye ederim demek zorundayım 300 saate yakın oynadım.Oyunun çok fazla teknik problemi var hit boxları,server işleyişi,lag switchler,buglar bunlar pek çok teknik problem.Killerların daha güçlü olmasına rağmen killerların daha da broken olması survivorların nerflenmesi oyunun git gide düşüren kavramlar.Ama baktığınız zaman konsept güzel arkadaşlarınızla eğlenirsiniz.Oyunlarda eğlenmek içindir zaten ama bu saydığım teknik özellikler çoğu zaman oynanışı etkilediği için sinirlenip rage quit atmanız fazlasıyla muhtemel bir oyun.Ama her şeye rağmen tavsiye ediyorum belki bir gün düzeltmeyi denerler.
